message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a novel framework for improving the accuracy of certainty-based, closed-world classifiers using a conditional generative network and a reject option during inference. This framework is applicable to any certainty-based classifier or rejection function and is not limited to multilayer perceptrons. Given these characteristics, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.CV (Computer Vision), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and cs.CL (Computation and Language).
